WorkItem.Description:
include Makers, Polylines, Polygons, Ground Overlays, Tile Overlays, Custom Overlays
see http://code.google.com/intl/en/apis/maps/documentation/overlays.html for more info.

Comments.Message: Makers, Polylines are ok. Basicaly by creating custom marker you can get any type of object on the map. Any ideas for improvement?
Please also add visualisation properties, including the main map.

I was thinking about:
* Opaque level (especially in case you have areas/territories).
* MinZoomLevel and MaxZoomLevel. Eg. Layer is visible between zoomlevel 4 and 12.
* You might think about global marker properties (like size, style, tooltip), that are attached to a layer. But I think the programmer should take care of that.
basic overlay suport in windows forms are ok now
